title: Penalized for being afk when I wasn't
body: This is the second time in 3 days I've been put in 20 minute low priority while actively moving around. What is Riots definition of AFK? If I'm being placed in low priority queue due to not being aggressive enough then you need to have an in-game message that reflects such. Playing passive to not feed is not the same as being AFK.

replies.body: I took a look into this for you and it looks like you've had a considerable amount of leaves over the week to result in a lower priority queue.  We don't have information to provide on what Leaverbuster is looking for beyond our [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  If you have anymore questions on best practices, please reach out to your peers and let your voice be heard on the[ Player Behavior](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) Boards.
